claim: The rights to the "Might and Magic" name were purchased for $1.3 million by Ubisoft, which revived the franchise with a new series under the same name.
subclaims:
The rights to the "Might and Magic" name were purchased for $1.3 million by Ubisoft.
Ubisoft revived the franchise with a new series under the same name.

claim: Thirteen men finished the mile faster than 4:00:00, an American record.
subclaims:
Thirteen men finished the mile faster than 4:00:00.
This is an American record.

claim: Subsequently, the crew is largely Polish and the audience consists of English speaking locals and Australian ex-pats.
subclaims:
The crew is largely Polish.
The audience consists of English speaking locals.
The audience consists of Australian ex-pats.

claim: The University of California Irvine hosts the UCI Machine Learning Repository, a data resource which is very popular among machine learning researchers and data mining practitioners.
subclaims:
The University of California Irvine hosts the UCI Machine Learning Repository.
The UCI Machine Learning Repository is a data resource.
The UCI Machine Learning Repository is popular among machine learning researchers.
The UCI Machine Learning Repository is popular among data mining practitioners.

claim: Olga Danilov (Template:Lang-he-n; born November 27, 1973) is an Israeli short track speed skater.
subclaims:
Olga Danilov was born on November 27, 1973.
Olga Danilov is an Israeli short track speed skater.

claim: Martin did important editorial work and co-authored three influential books: "Several complex variables" (1948), "Elementary differential equations" (1956), and "Differential space, quantum space, and prediction" (1966).
subclaims:
Martin did important editorial work.
Martin co-authored three influential books: "Several complex variables" (1948), "Elementary differential equations" (1956), and "Differential space, quantum space, and prediction" (1966).

claim: Newry City Ladies were founded in 2011 as part of Newry City F.C. and were entered into NIWFA division 4.
subclaims:

Newry City Ladies were part of Newry City F.C.

claim: Making his debut for Pakistan against Zimbabwe on 24 October 1996, there is some doubt as to the validity of Raza's age at the time.
subclaims:

claim: Show Low Shuttle provides 24/7, non-stop, door to door shuttle service from Show Low to any city in Arizona.
subclaims:
Show Low Shuttle provides 24/7, non-stop, door to door shuttle service.
The shuttle service is from Show Low to any city in Arizona.

claim: Newspaper pages are laid out on a grid that consists of a margin on 4 sides, a number of vertical columns and space in between columns, called gutters.
subclaims:
Newspaper pages are laid out on a grid.
The grid has a margin on 4 sides.
The grid has a number of vertical columns.
The grid has space in between columns, called gutters.
